main.name: Sujit Pradhan
main.description: With more than 7 years of experience in Web Technologies, I have a passion of creating state of the art and performant websites that work across platforms, devices & browsers. In my free time I love to travel around the globe and click pictures of nature.
main.contactMessage: Have a Question? You can use the contact form below to contact me or use my email address directly.

education.description: Major: IT-Security and Information and Communication Systems

work.company: GoTo Technologies Germany GmbH (previously LogMeIn GmbH)
work.title: Software Development Engineer ➡️ Senior Software Development Engineer
work.description: Integral part of teams developing GoToMeeting, GoToMeeting Messenger and GoToResolve. $ Used Clean Coding Principles and used measures for improving performance of React Applications. $ Contributed to external projects - Chakra UI. $ Working as Master Security Champion which includes being the flag bearer of security within the team. $ Mentored and lead team into unification of multiple collaboration tools. $ Worked as Acting Scrum Master to enable the team to perform with minimal obstacles and to ensure a smooth development workflow.

work.title: Master Thesis Praktikant
work.description: Developed an Open Source Tool which would generate the User Interface based on the Thing Description. $ Using the Thing Description of each Thing, the tool would generate the User Interface for the Thing in order to control the Thing.

work.title: Front end specialist(part-time)
work.description: Single-handedly developed a complete GUI for SysDL2.0. $ Demo of the GUI was shown and well accepted at E-World 2017 (E-World is Europe’s Biggest Energy Trade Fair)

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: Front end specialist in Core Architecture Group for Web of Systems. $ Developed a custom graph plotting framework for Siemens WoS project

work.title: Systems Engineer ➡️ Senior Systems Engineer
work.description: Developed a full stack Java application for a leading Automobile Company. $ Transitioned from Java Developer to Front End Specialist.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
